question: What is the name of the strait in Tierra del Fuego archipelago on the extreme southern tip of South America between Chile and Argentina?
explanation: Beagle Channel is a strait in Tierra del Fuego archipelago on the extreme southern tip of South America between Chile and Argentina. The channel's eastern area forms part of the border between Chile and Argentina and the western area is entirely within Chile. This channel was previously the location of Beagle Conflict, a border dispute between Chile and Argentina.
